result.execSummary:
The defendant Jason C Olsen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Must report to Probation within the next 48 hours (06/09/15). Must follow all recommendations of Probation.

miscConds.notes: May not possess or use firearms or body armor.
Cannot vote until civil rights are restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored, if not US citizen may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.
Must provide a DNA sample, no surcharge. Must complete a COMPAS Evaluation and follow through. Must follow through with Mental Health regimen.

timeConds.notes: Conditional time IF REVOKED. Subject to work release but no good time.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jason C Olsen

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

CASES: 15CF214, 14CF218, 14CT67, 14TR1992 & 14CF382
15CF214-Count 2-NC plea.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty & judgment entered.  All other counts/citations/cases DRI.  CT finds waiver of PSI.  
Qualify for CIP & Substance Abuse pgm.  
SENTENCE:  w/h sentence, probation up to 1 yr.  DNA sample, no surcharge.  Follow recomm of probation.  COMPAS.  Follow thru on MH regimen.  No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, no body armor, other civil rights may be lost until restored, if not US citizen face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights. Credit for 17 days of sentence credit.  Impose 6 mo conditional time if revoked, subj to WR, no GT.  CT costs waived.  Must report to probation w/in next 48 hours.  PCR.  11:33 am adj.

15CF214-CT grants waiver of PH.  CT finds PC, def bound over.
